name: Hooker Furniture Corporation
description: Hooker Furniture Corporation is a leading designer and importer of residential and commercial furniture, recognized for its commitment to quality craftsmanship and innovative designs. Founded in 1924 and headquartered in Martinsville, Virginia, the company has built a strong reputation in the furniture industry over nearly a century. Hooker Furniture offers a diverse range of products that include home office, dining room, bedroom, and living room furniture, as well as home accents and accessories. The company's extensive portfolio features both traditional and contemporary styles, catering to various consumer tastes and preferences. With a focus on sustainability, Hooker Furniture employs environmentally responsible practices in its manufacturing processes and product offerings. The company has a robust distribution network and operates through multiple channels, including retail stores, e-commerce, and a growing international presence. Hooker Furniture is committed to delivering exceptional value and service to its customers while continuously innovating its product lines to reflect changing market trends. The company’s mission is to provide stylish, high-quality furniture that enhances the beauty and functionality of homes and workplaces.
